sentences.cn: …一所为心理失调儿童开设的学校。

sentences.en: Belong to menstruation after all so maladjusted?
sentences.cn: 这样到底是不是属于月经失调?

sentences.en: Can be period caused after donating blood excuse me maladjusted?
sentences.cn: 请问献血后会不会导致月经失调?

sentences.en: Is metabolism maladjusted how should recuperate? Rise in the morning and is honey useful? Can fat?
sentences.cn: 新陈代谢失调要怎么调理? 早上起来和蜂蜜有用 吗 ?会不会胖 呢 ?

sentences.en: Only men and women always prefer animals to human partners can really be considered sexually maladjusted.
sentences.cn: 只有总是宁愿与动物而不是与人的性伴发生性接触的男女,才能真正地被考虑出现了性失调.

sentences.en: Psychologists are dealing with the problem of maladjusted adolescence and " juvenile delinquency ".
sentences.cn: 心理学家对付着不适应环境的青少年和 “ 青少年犯罪 ” 的问题.

sentences.en: Though this picture has a sense of third dimension, its proportions look a little maladjusted.
sentences.cn: 这幅画虽然有立体感, 但看似有些比例失调.

words.tran_cn: 适应不良的；不适应的；不利于适应的

trans.tran_en: a maladjusted child behaves badly and is unable to form good relationships with people because he or she has emotional problems
